item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @LawlAmgad LawlAmgad
item.description:
@LawlAmgad wrote:

Hi, I made my own runescape private server last night and I’m having troubles. I was wondering how to get myself admin yes I have tried searching gone through tutorials nothing. Also I’m having problem with starter equipment: This is my code:

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=Blue PartyHat(2422); playerEquipment[playerCape]=Lava Cape(6570); playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=Amulet of fury(6585); playerEquipment[playerChest]=Dragon Chain(3141); playerEquipment[playerShield]=Crystal Shield(4224); playerEquipment[playerLegs]=Dragon Legs(4088); playerEquipment[playerHands]=Barrow Gloves(7462); playerEquipment[playerFeet]=Rune boots(4132); playerEquipment[playerRing]=Beserker Ring(6738); playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows(); playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Am I doing something wrong? Thanks again. And finally I have a no-ip server but how do I let other people connect to it it won’t let me sign in using it but will let me use Localhost. Thanks.

Read full topic
